website_summaries.verdict: If you're shopping on a budget, this is the stroller for you. It's basic, but it will get you where you need to go.
pros: Lightweight design makes it perfect for traveling
Compact and easy to fold down
cons: The handles are short for the average adult
Not sturdy enough for extensive daily use

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Tested this little stroller on a small walk with my 2 35 pound children. Strolled great. Turned easy. Easy to fold. It is light weight material and I may be pushing its limits with almost the max weight for it but I needed the most compact stroller I could find. I'm going to use it for a Disney world trip here in a month. If I come across any problems I will edit my review. As of right now, it's just what Iwas looking for and hope it just gets me through my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 4 & 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 4 & 3 year old. We needed a lighter, smaller, compact, double stroller to pack more easily in our van, so we had more room on our vacation and take in amusement parks. The stroller has convenient pockets to hold what we needed, and kept the sun off them. The wheels in the front middle do get stuck in turns sometimes, but it's not a bother. We also got the 'J is For Jeep Side By Side Stroller Weather Shield' to go over it, and it fits perfectly on it, and packs easily in the pockets, kept the toddlers dry at the parks.
customer_reviews.author: suby0402

customer_reviews.title: We took it downtown Baltimore for a historic event with a packed crowd (2 yr old & 6 month old in tow) & had a great day. The fr
customer_reviews.text: Well built for the price. We took it downtown Baltimore for a historic event with a packed crowd (2 yr old & 6 month old in tow) & had a great day.The front wheels turn on a dime, it went down 5 stars on the back wheels, (We carried it up with the 2 yr old walking) it folded up quickly for a boat tour, It went into elevators, ladies bathrooms even fit in the handicap stall's for diaper changes! It fits into my Honda's truck with room to spare. I just wish there would have been more color choices for the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick outings
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quick and compact stroller for my kids and this one did the trick. It's lightweight and doesn't take up much room. On the downside, the umbrella part is pretty useless as sun come pouring from the sides. I ended up bending the shades down to get a little more blockage. Needs a little bit more storage and it sucks when the kids fall asleep because it's so upright that they look uncomfortable. That being said. If your looking for something to hold your kids for a short trip, than this is the way to go. Anything longer than an hour and you might want to bust out your bigger stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September. Arrived with two broken buckles. We needed it for a trip the next day so decided to keep it and contact the company to replace the buckles. They send two replacements, then shortly after a third buckle broke. Just thin poor quality. Three months later in mid December after medium use (not our primary stroller) a wheel came off! Not worth the money. Yes it's light and easy for on the go, but it won't withstand even the lightest wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A Romano

customer_reviews.title: Average stroller but A+ customer support
customer_reviews.text: The stroller itself is a basic double umbrella, narrow enough to fit through doorways, nice mesh pouches to store anything for kids and adults (diapers, wallet, water bottle, phone, etc). The small sunshades aren't super protective, so we hardly use them (my kids wear hats). HOWEVER, I'm giving this 5 stars because customer service is excellent! At first when I found their website, I was hesitant. It was very basic and there was a cell number to text photos of the part we needed. After sending a few different photos, I got a reply within the hour and the part was shipped, with no cost to us! The part fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller - great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this stroller for 10 months. It is very sturdy and portable. We took the stroller hiking on a rocky trail one day (obviously this stroller is not designed for this). We lost one of the rubber wheels which has cause difficulty in using the stroller. When I contacted the manufacturer to get replacement parts, they quickly responded and mailed me two new wheels with hardware for FREE. And we live in Ireland! You don't get service like this very often anymore.
customer_reviews.author: jaime gill

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Is okay but I was worried about a few of the wheels giving way after one test run around the house. I would save yourself the trouble of a return and maybe buy something else for $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted. Unfortunately it broke within a few months of use. It’s out of the amazon return window and impossible to find contact for the company. I would not recommend, I would spend the extra money to buy one from a reputable company with contact info!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eryn VM

customer_reviews.title: Short and Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I have toddler twins and live in a townhouse with stairs. I needed a light weight stroller for getting in and out of my building to do errands. This stroller is VERY short. I am 5'6 and need to hunch down to push it. Also when pushing you can't comfortably walk behind it because the center wheel takes up too much space. It does not do well with curbs, but surprisingly has a good turn radius. The only real positive is that it is compact, and when folded fits into a hall closet and trunk with plenty of room to spare. I would not however buy again.
customer_reviews.author: janek

customer_reviews.title: excellent, 32 and 28 lbs of twins
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for the seller costumer service and 5 for the product, very light and strong, I love it, it would be more than excellent if it was with more than one sitting position, but for the price is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Maru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller for 50.00
customer_reviews.text: So pretty an lightweight. It has nice pockets for storage and the canopy which flips back in case you don't need it. I was so tired of my heavy double stroller and I found out this umbrella stroller for 50.00! The middle handle makes it easy to push the stroller through doorways. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Magicjanice

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller. I also have a big double stroller but I rarely use it because it's so heavy and too bulky for my car. This stroller is so light I can carry it with one hand when it's closed. Its also so easy to close together. Maybe it doesn't look as nice or lasts as long but it has already lasted long enough and has been extremely convenient. Only disadvantage is that it's short for tall people. I'm 5'3 and it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: great Cheap double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Cute basic design. Easy to fold and unfold. Main reason to buy was to fit in a small sedan car trunk that could not fit my giant graco double stroller. This folds up small enough to fit in trunk w plenty of other room or across the floor of the back seat. Would be great for airport/ flight but haven’t used it for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly in love with this product. It's difficult to find a side by side double umbrella stroller that isn't a small fortune. I ordered this for the beach...The Umbrella's are very small and hardly cover their heads. There is no basket (which I knew prior to ordering) ...and the wheels would turn in every which direction if I went at any speed faster than a normal walk.
customer_reviews.author: PEM's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable wheels
customer_reviews.text: The front wheels fell off mid walk. We lost the middle wheel but could trace back the side wheel in a busy school fete. Only used the stroller for the second time and it started falling apart. Its completely useless for me. What a waste of money and effort. I live in Australia , we don't get lightweight twin strollers here. I got it delivered to my brother in US who visits Australia couple of times a year. He carried this stroller all the way from US to Australia. Feel terrible, all that effort will now be going in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Parul

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stroller, glad I didn't waste my money buying a name brand one! My only issues are that its super hard to adjust the straps, but thats probably a good thing for the kids, and also you cant adjust the strap thats between their legs. Honestly, if you're reading reviews (like i did) looking for a budget friendly option thats going to last... you found it. We use ours almost every day and its holding up awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Castillo Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Buckle broke after a single use. I didn't expect super high quality. I expected some form durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ragy Eleish

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver through the busy crowds
customer_reviews.text: We got this to take to Disney. Pros: lightweight, able to get checked at the gate at the airport, easy to maneuver through the busy crowds, cheapest I found anywhere Cons: cheaply made...the clip to keep it closed when not in use broke on the first day, not a lot of room to put things..i.e. drinks Overall, it served it's purpose at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lightweight easy to use stroller. We have too many strollers so I wanted to only have 1 that was easy for both my kids to use. It’s not bulky or heavy like most other twin strollers. Couldn’t be easier or lighter. Doesn’t take up much trunk space either. Highly recommend. My kids are 4 and 1.5 and it fits them perfectly. I’d even take it to a theme park and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very light weight and sturdy. I was really impressed with it. My grand babies were also very comfortable and seemed to enjoy the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $50 I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Best $50 I've ever spent! I bought this for our first plane trip with my one-year-old twins, and it worked perfectly. It was easy to fold up quickly, even while holding a baby and using only one hand! We were able to get through security, baggage claim, and everywhere else quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: like cosco umbrella strollers
customer_reviews.text: one of wheels broke when going on a rough road with grabble. it works and does its job for price. I wish handles are facing the other direction, like cosco umbrella strollers. It is hard to push over a slight bump or a curve. It is also hard to control it one-handed.
customer_reviews.author: R R

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive double stroller for my toddler and baby that didn’t have all the bells and whistles and was lightweight. This was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Charise

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller, keep it in my trunk and use ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stroller, keep it in my trunk and use it for stopping at the store or anywhere unexpected. For most purposes it works well. Handles are not very comfortable and it is near impossible to steer with one hand. Any sideways pressure makes it feel like you could maybe break the handles but that hasn't happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: A-DUB

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have two little ones under the age of 5. This stroller was reasonably price, so I gave it a try. I was honestly surprised how well this thing handles. This thing turns on a dime. It is also compact and lightweight. I wpuld for sure recommend it to anyone looking for a double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned, but no refunded
customer_reviews.text: This item was made cheap. The wheels on each end did not move. I returned the product and have yet to receive my refund (2weeks later). Poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this stroller but took a chance. Boy was I glad I did! The bag for this stoller is huge and it fits everything I need. The stroller is compact and fits nicely in the car. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with two kids
customer_reviews.text: Great value and product. Used it on trip with two kids (10 months and 2 yrs) and it was a lifesaver in the airports and while out of town. It's light yet stable. I could hang the diaper bag on it and it wouldn't tip when the kids got out. Easy to fold up too. Now I keep it in my car for impromptu use until we travel again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Fantastic customer service. I own two. We've had two other strollers and nothing else compares in ease to use, lightweight design, or durability. To top it all off, the support is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Juge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price! Bought it to take the grandbabies on vacation. Really just wanted something to use in the airport and on the beach. This was perfect and we are still using it at home! I will say that we bought a gate check bag which saved us because the stroller tends to pop back open after being folded up.
customer_reviews.author: ElBee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for Dr
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for Dr. visits, store, etc. It fits through door ways easily and does not get hung up when you push it over gravel or other uneven areas.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA HUSK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy! My kids LOVE this stroller and it's so much easier and light weight than the heavy duty ones. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great stroller for the price! So easy to put together so easy to break down. Lots of room for the little ones. A little heavier than I was thinking it was going to be but definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for travel. Compact to fit with luggage and loved the double bags on back to hold everything. Searched for a compact double stroller to use for our 2 year olds first trip to Disney and this one surpassed my expectations. We have started using it for all of our outings and travel with them.
customer_reviews.author: Snocat

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but the wheels are not very ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but the wheels are not very sturdy, look they are about fall off when trying turn/maneuver at times. I don't use it very often so it serves it's purpose but I feel like it would fall apart if I used it more often. Not good to use on surfaces other than pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's working fine for little walks around the neighborhood when we don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, but you get what you pay for. It's working fine for little walks around the neighborhood when we don't want to carry a big heavy double stroller, but I don't think it'll last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Me

customer_reviews.title: Cute & fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute! I wanted something lightweight and not bulky. This is perfect. I usually don’t write reviews but I was nervous to buy because of bad reviews but I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Poulter

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and cute
customer_reviews.text: I got the stroller for my grandchildren. They love it. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Mosaffa

customer_reviews.title: great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: great for toddlers !! I bought this because I have two toddlers and a prius which means I am limited on stroler space when I am on the go .. this fit the bill perfectly A+++
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great big quality & functionality in compact portable pkg.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and solid build. Robust components that easily folds & stows for my 5'3" wife to load and unload.
customer_reviews.author: jason peters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Perfect for our family trip to Chicago
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Perfect for our family trip to Chicago. The little nets are a nice touch. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the canopies don't stay attached very well. Otherwise it's awesome for the price. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: hrb27

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Compact and easy to use, and the storage bags attached to the back are great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It was fantastic! Carried them easily AND our carry-ons
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this beauty to get me through several airports wth a 3 year old and 2 year old by myself. It was fantastic! Carried them easily AND our carry-ons, and was STILL easy to push. I am actually in the process of getting rid of all of my other double strollers because I am so in love with this!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddlers who are 19-months apart on their ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my toddlers who are 19-months apart on their first trip to Chicago. Easy to fold. Easy to haul. Easy to steer through crowds. Not at all bulky.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: worth it to spend 20-30 bucks more and get a better quality stroller
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of a slightly larger doll stroller. Scared the fabric will rip with my 2 year old twins. Handles on the stroller are hard and awkward and hurt my hands after minimal pushing. Turns ok. Wouldn't purchase, worth it to spend 20-30 bucks more and get a better quality stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little stroller. It's lightweight and folds easily. Perfect for my two grandchildren, ages 2 1/2 and 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting through the airport and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and well worth the price. We use it as a travel stroller for our twins when we fly. Perfect for getting through the airport and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: demodeck

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 9 month old twins to pick them up from daycare. Needed something that is easy to open and close and fit in the back of my small SUV. This stroller is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ridley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOUBLE STROLELR
customer_reviews.text: so light and compact for a double stroller. cant imagine a smaller one than this. used it a number of times since i got it, no issue with wheels yet.ill update if the stroller fails to preform on vacation but as of now i am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Seefeldt

customer_reviews.title: love the flexibility
customer_reviews.text: loves it. totally replaced my big stroller. love the flexibility, perfect for travelling and going through airport. had it for about 7 months now and using it everyday. so far no break, pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Harmonie Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good but the tires wore out after a few months. I havent been able to find replacements. I do love the small size. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: but its wheel is not so easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: it survived the long trip abroad, but its wheel is not so easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: robot trader

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but easy
customer_reviews.text: A buckle broke on our third use so :( But the company sent us two new replacements within the week. :)
customer_reviews.author: Briscomes

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight. Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids 2 1/2 and 1 to pack in a motor home for a trip to an amusement park
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is the best compact umbrella stroller. I bought it for quick runs to the store, only drawback is no 5 point harness.
customer_reviews.author: Mkero

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money on this stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller wheels fell off before I could even use it. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, super lightweight and compact, excellent travel stroller
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy to own it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for My granbabies. My daughter is very happy to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L'Amour

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this for our twins. Just wish there were an add on stand for the back for their four year old brother. :)
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: fold easy and small and is super lite weight
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I use it almost everyday. when I'm taking the bus. fold easy and small and is super lite weight.
customer_reviews.author: mary lou

customer_reviews.title: It was nice but didn't notice that it didn't have shoulder harnesses ...
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but didn't notice that it didn't have shoulder harnesses until we got it. Gave it away and ordered a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Pushes easy but could use cup holders and a storage area
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a second stroller and is alright. Pushes easy but could use cup holders and a storage area.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lilga

customer_reviews.title: great little double stroller
customer_reviews.text: great little double stroller, just for moving little grandkids in and out of daycare and short runs with them.. very light... no shoulder straps, so not for tiny ones, but fine for 7 mod old who sits up well and 2 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: W Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller to have
customer_reviews.text: I love having this stroller. Folds easily and compact. Fits through most doorways. I bought it for vacation, it was perfect for my almost 1 and 3 year old for street walking, museums and amusement parks. I have continued using it since back home. Holds up well and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice since it has back pockets to store sippy cups ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller went above my expectations. It is really nice since it has back pockets to store sippy cups and keys and it is really sturdy. Had to find something affordable and this one fits perfectly for my budget. It folds up nicely and does not take too much room in the back of my Toytoa Matrix. I had a double stroller (joovey) too and that one would take up my entire trunk's space...only good for the mini van.
customer_reviews.author: M+N

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but it's sometimes hard to turn when you're ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great, but it's sometimes hard to turn when you're coming from a full stop. Other than that, once you get it going, it's good to go. Very Light weight too
customer_reviews.author: Cheffrey213

customer_reviews.title: It folds down quickly and is very compact- which is great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months now and I am surprised how well this has held up. It folds down quickly and is very compact- which is great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: ... seat that would be ideal the weight is very good though it's very
customer_reviews.text: It's too wide hard to fit in a small door n hallways occupy too much space on sidewalks people have to walk around you it would be nicer to have front n back seat instead of side to side seat that would be ideal the weight is very good though it's very lite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Convenient for traveling in the airport but the wheels constantly get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: MR Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute,great for a lightweight double umbrella stroller. My babies loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nadin Al Attar

customer_reviews.title: works good for an umbrella stroller
customer_reviews.text: works good for an umbrella stroller. For the price its great. Only problem we had is that the middle of one of the buckles broke. It still snaps but has an edge now that is a little sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twitter stroller
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is small and convienent especially to go on a plane which I really needed but it gets stuck sometimes and becomes a little hard to push. The middle wheel is ackward when walking and pushing it. I think it would be more comfortable to push without it.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene mcgivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the twins. Folds up small for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: oscar olvera

customer_reviews.title: Happy :)
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! For the price and very light weight, easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: SALLY MEDINA

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for an umbrella stroller. I bought this for using at airports when I take my 2 kids. It will be easy to transfer and check in at the gates. My kids love being next to each other in this.
customer_reviews.author: YJG

customer_reviews.title: good stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great airport stroller. We used it for 3 weeks to Chile Peru and Mexico. It held up well for traveling in the Lima too. Our boys weight 37 lbs each the tires held up. But after this trip the stroller is done. Worth the 50 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mcar

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller itself
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller itself. The buckle does not stay clipped on one side. And the back wheels are a little crooked. . Other then minor issues it is a decent stroller for the price and light weight. Did the job for me temporarily only
customer_reviews.author: Camille button

customer_reviews.title: perfect for those times when you need it
customer_reviews.text: perfect for those times when you need it. quick n easy to use & fold love the storage nets too
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schillawski

customer_reviews.title: Great for airports!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in airports with my 20 month old twins. Stroller is lightweight, easy to fold quickly for security or by the gate, doesn't take up much room in the car, has 2 separate canopies so each child could decide what they wanted. Each seatback has a small mesh bag perfect for small toys, snacks or drinks. It's not nearly as comfortable as my double Britax so I would not recommend it for regular use but it's great for trips!
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile the roof and net bag is an awesome bonus
customer_reviews.author: Nataly Janik

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Folds up as flat as my single child umbrella stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 and 2 year old. It works great for outings. It is easy to fold. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: No way to lock once closed
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to lock it once it is closed. Must be all the only stroller on the market that likes that feature
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. This stroller is horrible quality and feel apart on us within a month of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: One of the front wheels (folds over)gave out in less then 3 months. We only used it on side walks with two kids under the age of 2. By the time it broke it was too late to return it. Contact information for manufacturer does not respond to email request for replacement wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for 4 and 6 year old at Disney
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Exactly what we paid for
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Good quality. Exactly what we paid for. Highly recommended for short trips into the store or to the community pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jfowler

customer_reviews.title: Feels unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Seatbelt broke with first use while trying to secure. Poorly made. Very disappointed with purchase and returned with hopes of refund
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tedford

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy. It has 2 bags I missed in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a double umbrella stroller. I'm happy. It has 2 bags I missed in the discritics that was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: ayla

customer_reviews.title: satisfied in product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was ship it only took me 2 minutes to set it up and both my babies love it and it was easy to fold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to fit in the trunk of our small car easily..
customer_reviews.text: Its small enough to fit in the trunk of our small car easily...however the seats are straight up and down, only have a lap band, the sun cover is so stiff and small it doesnt do much, and small netting bags that hang off the handles instead if baskets underneath. Easy to maneuver however and fits my four year old and one year old (just don't like how straight the seats are and lap band for her).
customer_reviews.author: Breann Painter

customer_reviews.title: I loved everything about this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this stroller, until I went to use it and one of the buckles doesn't stayed together. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this would have worked for older kids, our ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this would have worked for older kids, our young twins were able to tilt it forward because it lacks shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: j&l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. My kids are 2 and 4 and still fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The belt buckle clip broke after one week of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Isla

customer_reviews.title: This is second one we've owned. Front wheels can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is second one we've owned. Front wheels can sometimes be a little disobedient but the ease of use (open and close) , lightweight yet durable/strong construction make that almost an afterthought. And it's light enough to meet American Airline's stringent weight requirements for gate checking.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wright

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Wheels seem a little cheap and get stuck every now and them. Does the job for the most part though.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, greater customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing company to work with! The customer service was so far above and beyond anything I have encountered before. I love the stroller! Works great for my little guys.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. very impressed how easy it is to push 2 kids in it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Amoroso Twin Baby Stroller
feature_bullets: 360 degree swivel front wheel and bake at rear wheel
Two net bags at handle, light weight and small size easy to fit into auto trunk
